document.full_text: sony corp websites in three countries have been hacked and personal information for about 8,500 people has been leaked from the consumer electronics maker's greek website, jiji news service reported on tuesday.
document.title: sony websites hacked, greek users' information leaked: report
lines_and_colors: sony corp websites in three countries have been hacked and personal information for about 8,500 people has been leaked from the consumer electronics maker's greek website, jiji news service reported on tuesday.
